T.query: select q.surveyid,c.questionid,c.id from questions q join choices c on q.id = c.questionid where ( q.externalsystemid >70 and q.etl_time < '2016-12-16' and q.questioncode >=4 and  q.maxresponses = 1 ) or (q.required='t' and q.imageid<1000 and c.etl_time  > '2017-02-01') or (c.imageid<1000 and c.choiceposition =3)

F.query: select q.surveyid,c.questionid,c.id from questions q join choices c on q.id = c.questionid where ( q.externalsystemid >70 and q.etl_time < '2016-12-14' and q.questioncode >=4 and  q.maxresponses = 1 ) or (q.required='t' and q.imageid<1000 and c.etl_time  > '2017-02-01') or (c.imageid<1000 and c.choiceposition =3)

select q.surveyid,c.questionid,c.id from questions q join choices c on q.id = c.questionid where ( q.externalsystemid >70 and q.etl_time < '2016-12-16' and q.questioncode >4 and  q.maxresponses = 1 ) or (q.required='t' and q.imageid<1000 and c.etl_time  > '2017-02-01') or (c.imageid<1000 and c.choiceposition =3)

select q.surveyid,c.questionid,c.id from questions q join choices c on q.id = c.questionid where ( q.externalsystemid >70 and q.etl_time < '2016-12-16' and q.questioncode >=4 and  q.maxresponses = 1  and c.style is null ) or (q.required='t' and q.imageid<1000 and c.etl_time  > '2017-02-01') or (c.imageid<1000 and c.choiceposition =3)

select q.surveyid,c.questionid,c.id from questions q join choices c on q.id = c.questionid where ( q.externalsystemid >70 and q.etl_time < '2016-12-16' and questionposition >=4 and  q.maxresponses = 1 ) or (q.required='t' and q.imageid<1000 and c.etl_time  > '2017-02-01') or (c.imageid<1000 and c.choiceposition =3)

select q.surveyid,c.questionid,c.id from questions q join choices c on q.id = c.questionid where ( q.externalsystemid >70 and q.etl_time < '2016-12-14' and q.questioncode >=4 and  q.maxresponses = 1 ) or (q.required='t' and q.imageid<1000 and c.etl_time  > '2017-02-01') or (c.imageid<1000)
